thread.section_title: TelephoneNigeria.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TelephoneNigeria.com | telephonenigeria.com
thread.title: Chijioke

author: Chijioke
title: Chijioke
text: I have been using telephone Nigeria for the best part of 3 years now. I stumbled upon it on a day my wife desperately needed to make calls, and could not as she had no money. Went online to check if there was a way to send her credit from London, and found telephone Nigeria. Registration process was straight forward, adding numbers you wanted to send credit to in Nigeria was straight forward and easy and so was making payment, fast and efficient. She had her credit in the short space of 5 minutes. Highly recommended
